mapper.title: Add a concept
mapper.description: Click "ADD CONCEPT" to add a concept for your new course.

mapper.title: Open course tray
mapper.description: Click the floating arrow button to open or close the course tray. The course tray lets you choose courses that are prerequisites for the current course.

mapper.title: Create another course
mapper.description: Create a new course that is a prerequisite for the course you created first.

mapper.title: Mark a course as a prerequisite
mapper.description: Add a course to the prerequisites of the current course by clicking the checkbox next to the course name in the course tray.

mapper.title: Freeze prerequisite
mapper.description: Similarly to freezing courses and concepts, you can freeze a prerequisite to prevent the link between the courses from being removed.

mapper.title: Add a concept to the new course
mapper.description: Add a concept to the newly created prerequisite course.

mapper.title: Draw a link from a prerequisite
mapper.description: Click a right-pointing triangle to start drawing a link, then click another triangle to create the link.

mapper.title: Focus a concept
mapper.description: Click on a concept to focus it and highlight links from it. When links are highlighted, you can click them to open its context menu to delete it.

manager.title: New course
manager.description: Enter the name for a new course.

manager.title: New course
manager.description: Enter themes for the new course. Type a theme and then press ENTER or TAB to finish it.

manager.title: New course
manager.description: "Frozen" means the course can't be modified or deleted, but new concepts can still be added. Only staff members can un-freeze courses.

manager.title: New course
manager.description: "Official" is metadata indicating the course came from the template. It is automatically set to true for all concepts in a template when a student clones the template.

manager.title: New course
manager.description: Finally, click "CREATE" to create the course.

manager.title: Open a course
manager.description: Click a course to view and manage its concepts.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: Enter the name for a new concept.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: Enter a description for the new concept.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: Enter tags for the new course.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: "Frozen" means the concept can't be modified or deleted. Only staff members can un-freeze concepts.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: "Official" is metadata indicating the concept came from the template. It is automatically set to true for all concepts in a template when a student clones the template.

manager.title: New concept
manager.description: Finally, click "CREATE" to create the concept.

manager.title: Filter concepts
manager.description: The filter bar can be used to search for a concept by its name.

manager.title: Sort concepts
manager.description: You can change how concepts are sorted here.

manager.title: Merge concepts
manager.description: After merging students' workspaces, you can merge two or more concepts. This is useful if the student workspaces had the same concept with slightly different wording.

manager.title: Select concepts
manager.description: Select the concepts to merge by clicking the checkboxes that appear.

manager.title: Finish merging
manager.description: To finish the merge, click the "Mergeâ€¦" button. Alternatively, click cancel to stop without merging.

graph.title: Course filtering
graph.description: This list lets you show and hide specific courses in the graph. It also shows the course color that concepts are colored with.

graph.title: Zoom
graph.description: This slider can be used to zoom in and out of the graph. You can also use your mouse wheel to zoom.

graph.title: Switch to course view
graph.description: The default view is the concept graph, but this button lets you switch to the course graph. The same button in the course graph will switch back to the concept graph.

graph.title: Reset layout
graph.description: This button resets the graph layout. If you hide or show courses in the course filter list, you can click this to fix the layout.

graph.title: Reset zoom
graph.description: This button resets the zoom to the original level.

heatmap.title: Course cell
heatmap.description: The color of the cells show how strong of a dependency the target course (row) has on the prerequisite course (column). When hovering over a cell, you see the list of concepts.

home.title: Create a workspace
home.description: Click the "+" to create a new workspace for working on mapping.

home.title: Workspace actions
home.description: Click the "more" icon to show actions you may take on the workspace.

home.title: Go to workspace
home.description: Click the workspace in the list to access it. By default this brings you to the "workspace manager" view. Other views can be accessed from the "more"-menu or from the bottom navbar of the workspace view.

home.title: Create a project
home.description: Click the "+"-icon to create a new project for collaborative mapping.

project.title: Create a template workspace
project.description: Click the "+" to create a new template for working on mapping.

project.title: Template actions
project.description: Click the "more" icon to show actions you may take on the template. To be able to invite student you need to set a template as active. Only the currently active template will be cloned by students.

project.title: Go to template
project.description: Click the template workspace in the list to access it. By default this brings you to the "workspace manager" view. Other views can be accessed from the "more"-menu or from the bottom navbar of the workspace view.

project.title: Invite student to contribute
project.description: Click the "Invite students" button to be able to generate a shareable link for students. The currently active template will be cloned to invited students, however they will not be able to modify any of the predefined courses, concepts or links.

project.title: User workspace actions
project.description: Click the "more" icon to show actions you may take on the workspace.

project.title: Checkout a user's workspace
project.description: Click the workspace in the list to access it.

project.title: Merge user workspaces
project.description: Click the "Merge" button to merge the user workspaces cloned from the currently active template. The merge tries to combine concepts and links when possible, but the workspace will need cleanup. This can easily be done from the workspace manager view.

project.title: Merge actions
project.description: Click the "more" icon to show actions you may take on the merge.

project.title: Go to merge
project.description: Click the merge workspace in the list to access it. It is like any other workspace.
